verbose_text: As shown in Figure XREF_FIG F, the IC 50 of Pt (IV) NP-cRGD incubated with the alpha v integrin downregulated SKOV3 cells became similar to that of the Pt (IV) NPs, thus indicating a crucial role for combining the cRGD ligands with the alpha v beta 3 and alpha v beta 5 integrins in enhancing the cytotoxicity of Pt (IV) NP-cRGD against the SKOV3 cells.
evidence: alpha v beta 3  and alpha v beta 5  integrins in enhancing the cytotoxicity of Pt
